1098240864780996609.text: STOP THE INSANITY. The University of Charlotte. Simple. Effective. Elegant. #AdoptTheUofChttps://twitter.com/Diamond9erFans/status/1098240123660103681 …

1123357629554860033.text: Reminder: Nothing is confirmed, even if tweeted by media, until campus police and/or CMPD are the quoted source.

1123359203832356864.text: BREAKING: Mecklenburg EMS says two people have died, two have serious injuries and two have non life threatening injuries #UNCC @wsoctv

1123369553319333888.text: I don’t create a lot of tweets of my own. But my heart is with my fellow Niners. #charlotte #NinerNation

1123364228377796609.text: Hoping all our friends at UNCC are safehttps://twitter.com/ap/status/1123352214725124102 …

1123371100451295234.text: To the future Niners, don’t let this dissuade you from joining the niner family. I, and everyone who has walked the campus can attest that #UNCC is safe and you will always feel safe. This occurrence was done by a coward and he does not reflect anyone or anything at UNCC

1123367270879768577.text: Praying for #UNCC & all victims involved in this senseless shooting. I am & always will be glad to be a 49er

1123371679277731840.text: IG family please keep the UNC Charlotte community in your prayers. As many of you know, I presently serve as president of the black alumni chapter and our student engagement committee… https://www.instagram.com/p/Bw5gJodh3uI/?utm_source=ig_twitter_share&igshid=1bc2hxbs5g958 …

1123368359582736384.text: If they find the name of whoever did this, DO NOT SAY THEIR NAME, DO NOT SHOW THEIR PICTURE. #UNCC

1123363970805641216.text: How much heartbreak has to happen with these shootings before enough is enough. That’s not a political statement. That’s a human being statement.

1123386860489850885.text:
I’m heartbroken for the families that lost loved ones today. A very sad day for #NinerNation. 

@unccharlotte @49erAlumni @UNCCharlotteBAC @Charlotte49ers @TheFirst49

1123400558549839874.text:
PLEASE SHARE:

Our officers and @UNCC_Police are still clearing buildings on campus. Please hang tight until we get to your building. Do not leave until your building has been cleared.

1123402445835657222.text: No right way to convey the way I feel about the shootings on Charlotte's campus tonight. Heartbroken and furious at the same time. #charlottestrong

1123369291536060417.text:
DON'T SAY HIS NAME! DON'T SHOW HIS FACE!

REMEMBER THE VICTIMS, NOT THE MONSTER WHO COMMITED THIS ACT

#UNCC #UNCCSHOOTING #CharlotteStrong #NinerNation

1123361426641444866.text: #BREAKING: Police confirm there is “no reason to believe any other shooter at #UNCC.” We bring that up because so many rumors on Twitter. Be careful who you follow and what you spread. Use legitimate information.https://twitter.com/mollygrantham/status/1123358520991207424 …

1123364983092465664.text: My foundation was built in rural NC, but my first level for what I have become was built at UNC Charlotte. Prayers to those injured and those that lost loved ones. This is extremely sad. #CharlotteStrong

1123363665502187521.text: PLEASE SHARE THIS MESSAGE!! Families meet your loved ones at 8600 University City Boulevard. Media head to the O'Charley's nearby.https://twitter.com/CMPD/status/1123357098052661248 …

1123428431771983874.text: We are heartbroken. We are angry. But most of all, we are strong together, a family of Niners who love our school and are here for one another. We hold the victims close in our hearts. #CharlotteStrongpic.twitter.com/6iyclmA1KM
